examples.text: I want to book a flight
Hello I am looking for some help here
I want to talk with agent

intents.description: intent used to handover to agent using Watson Integration

values: OK. Let me know how I can help you
OK. Lass mich wissen, wie ich dir helfen kann
Hello. Good morning
I can sure help you, may I have your name please
How many people are traveling with you to this destination ( # of seats )?
Do you want also to book an Hotel?
are you sure you want me to transfer you to a representative?
Bist du sicher, dass ich dich zu einem Vertreter überweisen soll?
please ask your question
please ask your question
do you want to speak with live agent?
OK. Transferring...
ok, hope I helped you. have a nice day
Hello. Good afternoon
Thank you $CustomerName, Where would you like to go to?
What airport will you be departing from?
ok, hope I helped you. good night.
please ask your question
Bitte stellen Sie Ihre Frage
please ask your question
willst du mit live agent sprechen?
OK. Übertragen ...
ok, hoffe ich habe dir geholfen. Einen schönen Tag noch
Hello. Good evening
Do you need a car rental?
can you repeat where would you like to go to?
can you repeat the number of seats
transfer you to an agent. have a good flight.

agent_available.message: transfer you to an agent. have a good flight.

agent_unavailable.message: I'm sorry, but no agents are online at the moment. Please try again later.

generic.message_to_human_agent: User asked to speak to an agent.

values: ok, hoffe ich habe dir geholfen. Gute Nacht.
please ask your question

dialog_nodes.title: Language not supported - transfer to live agent

values: i'm sorry but i can't recognized your language, transferring you to our live agent.
What are your dates of travel? start with departure
what type of car?

values.text: Do you want me to transfer you to an agent in order to complete the process ?
Es tut mir leid, aber ich kann keine Antwort auf Ihre Frage finden .....

values: What is your return date?
What type of transmission?

values.text: Your chat is transferred to Live Agent

agent_unavailable.message: Response when no agents are online

values: Please say your name again
can you repeat what is your return date
can you repeat what is the airport name

context.SummaryData: Caller asked for call to be transfered

values: OK. Transferring...

values.text: i'm sorry but i can't find answer to your question.....

values: Number of Beds?
OK. Übertragen ...
what type of hotel would you like? 4 or 5 stars
can you repeat what is your departure  date
welcome to Travel Assist Agency, how may i help you?

context.SC_TestOP: watsonx Assistant Live Agent handover test

values: Excellent $CustomerName, now I will summarize your request : you want to book a flight to $Destination for $seats people. dates of travel: $departure until $return. departing  airport will be: $airport, and you also want to book $stars stars hotel with $beds double beds.
